from fastai.vision import *
importing * is not considered best practice. Consider importing functions/classes you need explicitly.
"we demonstrate training and evaluating a CNN image classification model. "
Consider re-wording to: we demonstrate how to train and evaluate a CNN image classification model”.
We suggest using an Azure DSVM Standard NC6 for an as needed GPU compute resource
Wording is off. Consider changing to “… NC6 as a GPU compute resource”
The helper function downloads and unzips data set to the image_classification/data directory
Change the file path to classification/data.
These are linked metrics that quantify how well the model classifies an image against how it fails.
Wording is off. Consider changing to: “…how well the model classifies an image against a known label, and where it fails”.
Use blackcellmagic extension to format the notebook code cells.
